> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nightlight felt uneasy, she had the feeling that something will happen soon

It took a short while to clean the room, as NIGHTLIGHT was attempting
to do. But eventually the debris from the fallen picture was picked up
and the room was set back in order. The lights of the room were
burning brightly as NIGHTLIGHT worked.

Even as she was reseating herself back in a chair, the door of the
room slid open. However instead of it being DARK RODIMUS, or anyone
else she recognized for the matter, it was the tall visage of an
unknown robot stood there to greet her, with three other identical
looking SHARKTICON guards standing behind the stranger.

The unknown soldier smiled wickedly at NIGHTLIGHT, "You will come with
us." He said in dark tones as the SHARKTICONS came in to apprehend
NIGHTLIGHT.

(TAG)

- Preston
